# GBA1 and GBAP1 manuscript
This repository contains the code used to generate the plots used in the GBA1 and GBAP1 manuscript.

## Code contents

Within this repository you will find:

| Directory | Description |
| --------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [data](data)| Data used for the analysis. Most will not be available due to size. |
| [results](results) | Results from all analyses. |
| [scripts](scripts) | Contains analysis scripts. Each script contains a one-line description and is also referenced in its corresponding `.Rmd`. |
